name: Hellenic Culture Centre - Ifigenia Georgiadou
goal: The aims of the institution are to promote language learning and language teaching and to contribute to adult education and intercultural education methodology. It also works on:research on educational needs, material, teaching methods; production of educational materials and methods of long-distance learning; planning of programmes, curricula and educational services to other organizations
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training
euInitiatives: Επί του παρόντος δεν παρακολουθούνται συγκεκριμένοι φάκελοι σχετικά με την πολιτική και τη νομοθεσία στην ΕΕ
